snippet: The rise of Suhail R. Rizvi, a major Twitter shareholder, illustrates how a new tech investor class with deep Wall Street connections is carving new paths into Silicon Valley’s terrain.
abstract: Rise of Suhail R Rizvi, major Twitter shareholder, illustrates how a new tech investor class with deep Wall Street connections is carving new paths into Silicon Valley’s terrain; Rizvi brought together consortium of investors whose superior wealth and hands-off philosophy make them more attractive to startups than traditional Silicon Valley venture capitalists, who often demand measure of control.

byline.original: By ALEXANDRA STEVENSON and NICOLE PERLROTH

lead_paragraph: The rise of Suhail R. Rizvi, a major Twitter shareholder, illustrates how a new tech investor class with deep Wall Street connections is carving new paths into Silicon Valley’s terrain.

headline.main: At Twitter, Working Behind the Scenes Toward a Billion-Dollar Payday
headline.print_headline:
So Far, So Good for Twitter: Working Behind the Scenes
To a Billion-Dollar Payday
